Dhtmlxtabbar V1 1 New Functionality New Possibilities To Create Rich Dhtml Tab Interfaces

20 Nov 2006

Scand has released the new version 1.1 of dhtmlxTabbar, simple and flexible JavaScript UI control for building tabbed interfaces. Now this Ajax-based tab bar allows developers easily create nested tabs, initialize tabbar in pure HTML without single javascript command and manage tabs layout and appearance on the fly using its script API.
